About

This website was created for the purpose of spreading the idea of libre software.

Community

  • Use the avenir@andrewyu.org mailing list to discuss about issues. We prefer reading more information in each email. Contact Andrew to join it.
  • Join #avenir on irc.andrewyu.org.
  • Subscribe to our blog feed.

Wish you good luck on your journey to computing freedom :)
